name: CNContactVCardSerialization
desc: An object you use to convert to and from a vCard representation of the user's contacts.

items.name: class func contacts(with: Data) -> [CNContact]
items.desc: Returns the contacts from the vCard data.

items.name: class func data(with: [CNContact]) -> Data
items.desc: Returns the vCard representation of the specified contacts.

items.name: class func descriptorForRequiredKeys() -> CNKeyDescriptor
items.desc: Use to fetch all contact keys required to create vCard data from a contact.
